name: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
notes: A powerful drama about rebellion and institutional control.

name: Forrest Gump
notes: A touching tale of a simple man living an extraordinary life.

name: The Shawshank Redemption
notes: An inspiring story of hope and resilience behind bars.

name: Fight Club
notes: A dark, stylish critique of consumerism and identity.

name: Interstellar
notes: A visually stunning and emotional sci-fi epic.

name: Se7en

name: City of God
notes: A raw and gripping portrayal of life in the slums of Rio.

name: The Green Mile
notes: A touching supernatural tale set on death row.

name: Whiplash
notes: An intense story of ambition, discipline, and obsession.

name: The Usual Suspects
notes: A masterfully told mystery with a legendary twist.

name: Memento
notes: A psychological thriller told in reverse chronology.

name: Inception
notes: A mind-bending thriller about dreams within dreams.

name: The Matrix
notes: A sci-fi classic exploring reality and simulation.
